# About Spark Social Science


The Spark Social Science is an endeavor by the [Urban Institute](http://www.urban.org/) to expand access and understanding of modern big data capabilities to social scientists and public policy reseachers.

image: ![](images/urban.png)

This work is generously funded by the [Alfred P. Sloan Foundation](https://www.sloan.org).
